Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near Western
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Western due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Western due to signal problems. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Reroute at Harlem/Palmer
ShortDescription: 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Grand, Oak Park, North Avenue, and Harlem due to, street blockage at Harlem/Palmer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harlem, Grand, Oak Park, North Avenue, and Harlem due to, street blockage at Harlem/Palmer.

Allow extra travel time.
